column5: I am sure that like myself there are others here that need a little humor to settle down after reading some of the comments on the last couple of pages of the insane boaters thread So here it is     A guy rings his boss. I can't come to work today. The boss asks why? The Guy says it's my eyes. What's wrong with your eyes the boss asks? I just can't see myself coming to work, so I'm going fishing instead...
I was looking for and excuse to use tomorrow
Cute.  Ya last night gave me a headache.  I subsequently found humour on another's very serious post to which I need to go and apologize.
